punchline-2: Let our bots answer all the questions.
use-cases-permanent-desc-1: Assistants for your museums, amusement parks, cities ...
use-cases-permanent-desc-2: Bring your visitors closer to your place. Keep them up-to-date, integrate your services, games and more into your chatbot.
use-cases-ponctual-desc-1: Deploy a chatbot for your festivals, shows, parties ...
use-cases-ponctual-desc-2: Allow your visitors to have quick and relevant access to the information they need. Integrate your service, ticketing and more into your chatbot.
features-title: Integrate your IS and all your favorite services
pricing-complexity-custom-IS: custom questions linked to my IS
pricing-custom: Custom bot, contact us for an accurate quote
experience-punchline-2: Have control over your chatbot during all phases of your event
experience-before-description-1:
The possibilities of the chatbots have limits only those of your imagination.
Everything is possible or almost in terms of features with the ability to integrate external services like Spotify, YouTube, PayPal ... and even your own services!
The platforms supporting chatbots are numerous and the most used is probably Facebook Messenger with more than 2 billion users, however we also integrate our chatbots to Telegram or even a web interface designed by us.
experience-before-description-2: Before deploying the chatbot for the general public, set the possible answers, transmit the identity of your event through the chatbot.
experience-current-subtitle-1: Watch your chatbot in real time
experience-current-description-1:
Follow in real time the main metrics of your chatbot.
The number of messages exchanged, new users, the most used platforms and even the most frequent questions.
Have an eye on your event and the reactions of your audience.
experience-current-description-2:
With your chatbot, publish information quickly to all your users.
Whether for security information, program changes, keep your audience up to date.
experience-current-description-3:
Know in real time who is connected to your chatbot and their profile.
Have a little more knowledge of your public in order to constantly improve your event.
experience-current-description-4:
Make shine your mark with a double challenge: increase the use of the chatbot.
Make your brand visible on social networks or whith online contests integrated in your chatbot.
experience-after-main-subtitle: Analyze conversations and optimize your future event
experience-after-subtitle-1: What is your audience interested in?
experience-after-description-1:
What is your audience interested in? We know this.
Have access to analytics on the most frequently asked questions, be aware of what your customers want.
experience-after-subtitle-2: Survey your audience to gather their opinions
experience-after-description-2:
At any time during your event, survey your audience to get the information you want.
Integrate surveys easily into your chatbot and distribute them to your users.
